fields.Book Title: The Palgrave Encyclopedia of Early Modern Women's Writing
fields.Description/Abstract:
Article solicited for:
The Palgrave Encyclopedia of Early Modern Women's Writing, edited by  Patricia Pender and Rosalind Smith. The encyclopedia will include over 350 entries organized into 20 thematic and historical sections, for a total of 1-1.5 million words. The encyclopedia will be born digital, though eventually there is also going to be a print version. With this e-mail, we officially invite you to be an author for the following topic(s):
Please Submit: »Early Modern Polish Women Writers« (submission due: December 31, 2021; Author(s): Lubamersky, L.*)
